Facerecognition_person_AddPersonLabelWSR.description: Request object for adding a label to a person for face recognition purposes.

label.description: Label to add to the person

Facerecognition_person_AddPersonLabelWSR.description: Response object for adding a label to a person for face recognition purposes.

Facerecognition_person_CreatePersonWSReq.description: Request object for creating a person for face recognition purposes.

name.description: Name of the person to create

Facerecognition_person_CreatePersonWSRes.description: Response object for creating a person for face recognition purposes.

Facerecognition_person_DeletePersonWSReq.description: Request object for deleting a person for face recognition purposes.

Facerecognition_person_DeletePersonWSRes.description: Response object for deleting a person for face recognition purposes.

Facerecognition_person_FindPeopleByOrgWS.description: Request object for finding people by organization for face recognition purposes.
Response object containing people for an organization for face recognition purposes.

people.description: List of people for the organization

Facerecognition_person_FindPersonLabelsB.description: Request object for finding person labels by organization for face recognition purposes.
Response object containing person labels by organization for face recognition purposes.

additionalProperties.description: Map of person UUIDs to their associated labels

items.description: Map of person UUIDs to their associated labels

labelsByPerson.description: Map of person UUIDs to their associated labels

Facerecognition_person_GetPersonWSReques.description: Request object for retrieving a person by UUID.

Facerecognition_person_RemovePersonLabel.description: Request object for removing a label from a person for face recognition purposes.

label.description: Label to remove from the person

Facerecognition_person_RemovePersonLabel.description: Response object for removing a label from a person for face recognition purposes.

Facerecognition_person_UpdatePersonWSReq.description: Request object for updating a person for face recognition purposes.

Facerecognition_person_UpdatePersonWSRes.description: Response object for updating a person for face recognition purposes.
